<!-- Do not edit this file. It is generated automatically -->

## each() function

Iterates over Iterable/AsyncIterable, applying each in turn to `f`<!-- -->. (forEach)

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function each<A, B = unknown>(f: (a: A) => B, iterable: Iterable<A>): void;
```



## Example


```ts
each(console.log, [1, 2, 3]); // log 1, 2, 3
```
[Try It](https://codesandbox.io/s/fxts-each-kvz6w)


[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/each.ts)
